revised_title: Royal Society News and Events in 1949
tldr: This article from the "Notes and Records of the Royal Society of London" in 1949 covers various society news, including the election of foreign members, bequests, a gift to the society, the opening of the staff restaurant, and the quality of catering services. It also highlights the transformation of the basement into a well-equipped kitchen, dining room, and food store, and the potential for a community spirit among the Burlington House staff.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
